title: Language Proficiency Enhancement Program through Constructivist Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical language learning program for working professionals, utilizing digital devices for online collaborative tools

learning_goals: Through constructivist learning activities, learners understand contextual language use and apply situationally appropriate expressions
Learners enhance self-directed participation skills through project-based assessments during the language learning process
By achieving over 80% engagement in learning activities, learners improve language fluency and communication skills

resources: Online Collaboration Platforms (Google Workspace, Notion, etc.)
Digital Language Learning Tools (e.g., Anki, Quizlet)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
